content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal mine at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1)

### Iron plate factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z1) that crafts iron gear wheels
- Inserter (position a) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace to the assembling machine

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to crafting items
- Ensure you have the required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, iron-gear-wheel requires iron-plate, which cannot be crafted if there are no furnaces producing it.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
